Key Match Events: Rodrygo scored the winning goal with a 20-yard strike in the 30th minute.
Alisson Becker made a crucial save in first-half stoppage time to deny Moises Caicedo.
Post-Match Reflections: Dorival Junior's side bounced back with a win in front of their home fans.
Brazil leapfrogged Ecuador and Venezuela to move to fourth place with 10 points after seven matches.
